info.author: Brett Wandel
info.description:
pytest-report
===================================

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/wandel/pytest-report.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/wandel/pytest-report
    :alt: See Build Status on Travis CI

converts pytest output to atom's linter message

----

This `Pytest`_ plugin was generated with `Cookiecutter`_ along with `@hackebrot`_'s `Cookiecutter-pytest-plugin`_ template.


Features
--------

* TODO


Requirements
------------

* TODO


Installation
------------

You can install "pytest-report" via `pip`_ from `PyPI`_::

    $ pip install pytest-report


Usage
-----

* TODO

Contributing
------------
Contributions are very welcome. Tests can be run with `tox`_, please ensure
the coverage at least stays the same before you submit a pull request.

License
-------

Distributed under the terms of the `MIT`_ license, "pytest-report" is free and open source software


Issues
------

If you encounter any problems, please `file an issue`_ along with a detailed description.

.. _`Cookiecutter`: https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter
.. _`@hackebrot`: https://github.com/hackebrot

.. _`file an issue`: https://github.com/wandel/pytest-report/issues
.. _`pytest`: https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest
.. _`tox`: https://tox.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
.. _`pip`: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/
.. _`PyPI`: https://pypi.python.org/pypi
info.name: pytest-report
info.summary: Creates json report that is compatible with atom.io's linter message format
